name: Goal Setting Notion Template
description: Ensure you are always working towards your big vision and annual goals with this Notion goal-setting template. One benefit of reverse-engineering your goals this way is knowing exactly what to say and what to say no to. The template itself includes 4 sections and databases:Vision GoalsAnnual GoalsQuarterly TargetExecutive ScorecardDatabases also include templates with built-in prompts so you're guided through the entire process from start to finish.
features: Vision Goals; Annual Goals; Quarterly Target; Executive Scorecard
